description: When water or showers are a far-away luxury, these soft wipes are the next best thing. Soothing aloe and vitamin E formula is pH balanced, easy on your skin and doesn’t require rinsing.Super-soft viscose material is compostable (but please carry them out if you're in the wilderness) and stands up to stubble.Contains 36 wipes.Dimensions: 16 x 20cm.Resealable package keeps them from drying out.
name: Sea To Summit Wilderness Wipes - 36 Pack
